name: 陳柏端
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.
schedule:
1-9 周 資料收集
10-18 周 討論和結報撰寫
consultation: 無授課需求，以實體和線上討論。
